title: Where to Typecon
content:
Hello fellow Typophiles   
   
Iam going to take the big trip from the UK to San Fran for Typophile this year, wher I hope to meet everyone who has been so helpful / chatty for the past 18 months I've been getting help on my type from these boards.   
   
Anyway, I noticed that Typophile is being held on a hotel and I wondered, where does evryone plan to stay. Should I boom the hotel whih the conference is at? Where is everyone plannning to stay?   
   
See you all soon   
   
JIM
author: union

comments.content:
Firstly, dispite various enquiries about my intention to boom the hotel. Don't worry Iam just typing drunk (well it is friday night)   
   
Personally Iam going for the room with a rock garden in it...hehehe   
   
 [http://www.hotelnikkosf.com/page.asp?pid=16](http://web.archive.org/web/20051123024703/http:/www.hotelnikkosf.com/page.asp?pid=16)

Below ; despite the advertisement, no rock garden can be seen   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20051123024703im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/25260.jpg)

I think it's a huge advantage staying in the actual conference hotel. You only have to walk drunk and not drive drunk - the "Law of Averages" becomes much easier to handle.   
   
BTW, I've stayed at a Nikko once (Bangkok), and it was pretty classy, but very reasonably priced. But you don't want to know what "niko" means in Arabic.   
   
\> no rock garden can be seen   
   
You just reminded me of something funny that happened to me during the ATypI-Rome conference: the hotel I had found (on the web) said it had a roof-top pool, and I even remember seeing a photo of it. When I got there, the first thing I saw behind the check-in desk was an overly-prominent photo of the roof... with a huge flat area where the pool was supposed to be! I asked the guy "What happened to the pool?", and he says "We never have the pool." Very suspicious, I say.   
   
hhp

Since I love only an hour away and I don't drink, I plan on staying at my place ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20051123024703im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
Anyone interested in carpooling from the South Bay?
This is a board of mixed messages, Iam intending to "boom" the hotel and your looking for people who "love" near you to share a car...hahaha
When is TypeCon? What is TypeCon? Is it a hard hat zone?

a) This July.   
   
b) A type conference, education, party, auction, gallery, schmooze, brainstorm, festival.   
   
c) Only if Mr Downer takes his shirt off again.   
   
Indulge.   
   
 [http://typecon2004.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20051123024703/http:/typecon2004.com/)
